aircraft.value: Minotaur Heavy - AC-1620-678 at Regional Depot-C

defect_observed.value: Fire control computer error. Malfunction reported by flight crew.

root_cause.value: Component fatigue due to operational stress cycles exceeding design limits

findings.value: Detailed investigation conducted on the defective Ammunition Feed component. Functional testing confirmed the reported anomaly.

corrective_action.value: Clean and re-lubricate affected assemblies per technical manual

preventive_action.value: Update technical documentation with lessons learned

remarks_investigation.value: Detailed examination conducted. Corrective measures implemented.

remarks_design.value: Design review completed. No design modification required. Component replacement as per maintenance manual is adequate. Date: 01/01/2025 Authorized Signatory of Design: Dr. P.L. Mehta

remarks_quality.value: Dept. Component inspection records verified. All quality parameters were within acceptable limits during manufacturing. Date: 03/01/2025 Signature: Air Cmde R.K. Joshi

remarks_user.value: (Project):(if applicable) Operational history analyzed. No abnormal usage patterns identified. Agree with proposed corrective actions. Date: 02/01/2025 Signature: Sqn Ldr A.R. Desai

remarks_ordaqa.value: (Quality Aspects) From quality standpoint, root cause analysis is thorough. Corrective measures are appropriate. Concur. Date: 04/01/2025 Signature: Wg Cdr D.S. Nair

remarks_cemilac.value: / RCMA (Design Aspects) From regulatory standpoint, investigation meets required standards. Approve proposed corrective actions. Date: 06/01/2025 Signature: Dr. S.M. Kulkarni
